summary: A feature length documentary about the Free Kevin movement and the hacker world.
cast: Mark Abene|Ed Cummings|Robert Darlington|Emmanuel Goldstein|Sean Gullette|Alexis Kasperavicius|Lazlow|John Markoff|Kevin Mitnick|Tsutomu Shimomura|Jeffrey Stanton|Bruce Sterling|Deth Veggie|Kevin Bacon
title: Freedom Downtime
